name: DotCraft Unique Color Art Lite
description:
Create your own work of art. Color extraordinary picture arranged from dots. Use shiny crystals to achieve an amazing look. Try to combine different textures of dots, it also gives interesting results. Apply colors according to original template or ignore it, experiment.

Features:
- 70 colors to choose from,
- three types of dots (ball, shiny gem and gem),
- saving work progress,
- two picture (unicorn) to color.

It is lite version of DotCraft Plus, two picture to color are free.
All pictures are available in full version (for a small, one-time payment).
